achievementBadges.title: Code Cleanup Crew
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to contributors who help maintain code quality and cleanliness.

achievementBadges.title: Security Sentinel
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to individuals who contribute to identifying and fixing security vulnerabilities.

achievementBadges.title: Longevity Legend
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded for long-term, sustained contributions to the project over the years.

achievementBadges.title: Hacktoberfest Contributor
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the contributors who contribute to any Khulnasoft project during Hacktoberfest.

achievementBadges.title: Review Rockstar
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to individuals who provide thorough and valuable code reviews.

achievementBadges.title: Bring a Buddy
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the users who invite someone to Khulnasoft Cloud.

achievementBadges.title: Sharing is Caring
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded upon first-time sharing one of your Meshplay designs.

achievementBadges.title: Shipped
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded upon the success of your first design deployment.

achievementBadges.title: Need for Speed
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded upon successful execution of your first Meshplay performance test.

achievementBadges.title: Hip Hacker
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded the first time that you establish an interactive terminal session with a Kubernetes Pod.

achievementBadges.title: Log Streamer
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded the first time that you stream logs from a Kubernetes Pod.

achievementBadges.title: GitOps with Friends
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded the first time a collaborator saves changes to one of your designs.

achievementBadges.title: GitOps Connected
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to users upon establishment of a connection with Meshplay GitHub App.

achievementBadges.title: MeshMap Snapshot
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to users upon creation of their first infrastructure screenshot directly in their pull request.

achievementBadges.title: Continuous Contributor
achievementBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions for a long period of time in Khulnasoft projects in recognition and appreciation of their efforts.

projectBadges.title: UI/UX
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who create or improve designs for visual aspects or user flow for any of the websites, flyers, promotions, Meshplay UI, and so on in recognition and appreciation of their efforts.

projectBadges.title: MeshMap
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the MeshMap project in recognition and appreciation of their efforts. Community members who earn this badge occasionally become a project maintainer

projectBadges.title: Service Mesh Performance
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the Service Mesh Performance project. Community members who earn this badge occasionally become a project maintainer.

projectBadges.title: Community
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who repeatedly engage in welcoming, encouraging, and supporting other Khulnasoft community members. Community members who earn this badge occasionally graduate to undertaking the Community Manager role.

projectBadges.title: Meshplay
projectBadges.description: This badge isawarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the Meshplay project. Community members who earn this badge occasionally become a project maintainer.

projectBadges.title: Patterns
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the Service Mesh Patterns project in recognition and appreciation of their efforts.

projectBadges.title: Landscape
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the khulnasoft.com website.

projectBadges.title: Nighthawk
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the NightHawk project in recognition and appreciation of their efforts. Community members who earn this badge occasionally become a project maintainer.

projectBadges.title: Meshplay Catalog
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the Meshplay Catalog of Meshplay project in recognition and appreciation of their efforts.

projectBadges.title: Docker Extension
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the Docker Extension of meshplay project in recognition and appreciation of their efforts.

projectBadges.title: Meshplay Docs
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to the Meshplay Docs in recognition and appreciation of their efforts.

projectBadges.title: MeshSync
projectBadges.description: This badge is awarded to the community members who make consistent and impactful contributions to MeshSync in recognition and appreciation of their efforts.
